sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text: This Act may be cited as the Interstate Insurance Receivership Compact Act.

sections.heading: Ratification of Compact. The State of Illinois ratifies and
sections.text:
approves the Interstate Insurance Receivership Compact and enters into that
Compact with all other jurisdictions legally joining in it in substantially the
following form:

sections.heading: Corporate records of the Commission.
sections.text:
The Commission shall maintain its corporate books and records in
accordance with the by-laws.
